title: You Say All The Nice Things
lyrics:
You say all the nice things
That I want to hear
But when you lay me down
Those whispers disappear
Do you really want to be, be with me?

And do you want me to stay with you?

Do you really want to be, be with me?

And do you want me to stay with you?



So, I just want to know

What you want to do

I don't want to go

But I will if you want me to



Do you really want to be, be with me?

And do you want me to stay with you?

Do you really want to be, be with me?

And do you want me to stay with you?



You say all the nice things
